intro: Psychotria pusilliflora, commonly known as the small-flowered Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, greenish-white flowers and opposite, elliptical leaves. It typically grows as an understory shrub in humid, shaded environments. Psychotria pusilliflora is known for its chemical complexity, containing various alkaloids that have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
